thread.title: FCPT to Report First Quarter 2018 Financial Results

author: cnbc.com
title: FCPT to Report First Quarter 2018 Financial Results
text:
Conference Call and Webcast Scheduled for Thursday, April 26, 2018 at 11:00 a.m. Eastern Time / 8:00 a.m. Pacific Time
MILL VALLEY, Calif.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Four Corners Property Trust (NYSE: FCPT), a real estate investment trust (REIT) engaged in the ownership of high-quality, net-leased restaurant properties (“FCPT” or the “Company”), announced today that it will release financial results for the first quarter ended March 31, 2018, after the market close on Wednesday, April 25, 2018. A conference call and audio webcast with analysts and investors will be held on Thursday, April 26 at 11:00 a.m. Eastern Time / 8:00 a.m. Pacific Time, to discuss the results and answer questions.
Live conference call: 1-888-346-5243 (domestic) or 1-412-317-5120 (international)
Live webcast: https://services.choruscall.com/links/fcpt180426
Conference call replay available through July 26, 2018:
1-877-344-7529 (domestic) or 1-412-317-0088 (international)
Replay access code: 10119063
The Company is enabling investors to pre-register for the earnings conference call so that they can expedite their entry into the call and avoid the need to wait for a live operator.
In order to pre-register for the call, investors can visit http://dpregister.com/10119063 and enter their contact information. Investors will then be issued a personalized phone number and PIN to dial into the live conference call. Individuals can pre-register any time prior to the start of the conference call on Thursday, April 26.
About FCPT:
FCPT, headquartered in Mill Valley, CA, is a real estate investment trust primarily engaged in the acquisition and leasing of restaurant properties. The Company seeks to grow its portfolio by acquiring additional real estate to lease for use in the restaurant and related food services industry. Additional information about FCPT can be found on the Company’s website at http://www.fcpt.com/ .
View source version on businesswire.com : https://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180406005797/en/
FCPT
Bill Lenehan, 415-965-8031
CEO

Source: Four Corners Property Trust
